segments.text: I want to tell you I've put in my notice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been thinking about this for several months , well before the Spring Festival holidays .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the holidays provided you a chance to think over all this and make a decision ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , after receiving my yearly bouns , I want to search out better opportunities in the spring job market . I've been working in the company for nearly a year and a half and I still haven't received a pay rise . It's unfair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely . With your expertise and experience , you're clearly working below your pay grade .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's exactly why I decided to quit the job and find a new one .
segments.speaker: S1
